front.title: IEEE Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard defines a protocol and procedures for the transport of timing over bridged and virtual bridged local area networks. It includes the transport of synchronized time, the selection of the timing source (i.e., best master), and the indication of the occurrence and magnitude of timing impairments (i.e., phase and frequency discontinuities).
